message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $90.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm really interested in this product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your concerns about budget, Bob, but I think the product is worth more than $70. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $82?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we try $78? I'm really interested in this product, and I'm willing to pay a bit more than my initial offer.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $85?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $83. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I think we're really close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $86?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $84. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $87?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $86. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
